data.system_settings: Discord v3.3.3. on Android 6.0 mobile device: LG G4 smartphone
data.actual_result: <:bugbutton:268365281846362112>\:bugbutton\: (the second emoji icon doesn't convert correcttly)
data.short_description: Using only server-specific emoji when typed such as \:emoji\:\:emoji\: with two or more consecutive emoji per space-delimited message every even consecutive emoji does not convert to icon from Discord app on Android devices Photo example including input from computer/firefox and android app: http://goo.gl/BglOyg
data.steps_to_repro: - Use Discord v3.3.3 on Android 6.0 mobile device - In Discord environment, open any text channel on any server that has at least 1 server-specific emoji uploaded - Manually type or paste text code for a server-specific emoji (beginning and ending with colon, e.g. \:bugbutton\: on Discord Testers) and then push enter after inputting only one server-specific emoji - Now repeat previous step but type the emoji code two times consectively without any spaces in between each emoji code
